mapper.select: select musicnumber as musicNumber from bridgedb.like where usernumber=#{userNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from bridgedb.like where musicnumber=#{musicNumber} and usernumber=#{userNumber}
mapper.select: select albumnumber from bridgedb.like as l INNER JOIN album as a on l.usernumber = a.usernumber where usernumber=#{userNumber}
